title: The Tower of Babel
teaser: Where would you find the Tower of Babel today?
fact: The Tower of Babel was likely located in modern-day Hillah, Iraq, about 50 miles south of Baghdad.

title: Garden of Eden
teaser: Is the Garden of Eden a myth or a map coordinate?
fact: Some scholars speculate it was near the head of the Persian Gulf, where the Tigris and Euphrates rivers meet today.

title: Jonah's Nineveh
teaser: The city Jonah refused to visit is a major modern conflict zone.
fact: Ancient Nineveh is actually modern-day Mosul, Iraq. It remains a site of immense historical significance.

title: Abraham's Ur
teaser: From where did Abraham begin his journey?
fact: Ur of the Chaldees is now Tell el-Muqayyar, Iraq. It is home to a massive Ziggurat structure that is still visible today.

title: Adam & The Earth
fact: In Hebrew, 'Man' is 'Adam' and 'Ground' is 'Adamah'. It is a divine wordplay: Man was made from the ground.

title: The Camel & The Needle
teaser: Did Jesus really mean a camel?
fact: The Aramaic word 'gamla' can mean 'camel' OR 'thick rope'. A rope fitting through a needle makes visual sense, though both imply impossibility!

teaser: A 2,700-year-old secret passage you can walk in.
fact: Dug in 701 BC to hide water from Assyrians, this 1,750-foot tunnel still flows with water in Jerusalem today.

title: The Pilate Stone
fact: Skeptics doubted his existence until 1961, when archaeologists found a limestone block with his name carved on it in Caesarea.
